variants.name: base_black
variants.description: This black wizard hat is imbued with shadows, perfect for wizards who practice the mystical arts of stealth and invisibility.

variants.name: base_brown
variants.description: Crafted from the fibers of the ancient Earthwood tree, this brown hat enhances the wearer's affinity with earth-based magic.

variants.name: base_gray
variants.description: This hat is woven from the mist of the Graymarshes, ideal for spellcasters specializing in illusions and fog magic.

variants.name: base_red
variants.description: Sewn with threads dipped in dragon's blood, this red wizard hat grants the bearer powerful fire magic capabilities.

variants.name: base_teal
variants.description: Infused with the essence of the ocean, this teal wizard hat allows its owner to manipulate water and air to create devastating spells.

variants.name: base_yellow
variants.description: Crafted under the first light of the summer solstice, this yellow wizard hat enhances light magic and solar spells.

variants.name: white
variants.description: This pure white wizard hat is favored by those who draw power from the moon and stars, boosting their night magic significantly.

variants.name: black
variants.description: This deep black wizard hat is a gateway to void magic, enhancing dark spells and necromancy for the bold sorcerer.

variants.name: blue
variants.description: This bright blue hat is charged with the essence of the sky, granting the wizard control over weather and the skies.

variants.name: bluegray
variants.description: The bluegray color of this hat resonates with storm energies, ideal for wizards who specialize in thunder and lightning magic.

variants.name: brown
variants.description: This earth-toned wizard hat increases the user's control over geological forces, perfect for earth magic and geomancy.

variants.name: charcoal
variants.description: Charcoal black and imbued with smoke, this hat is for those who seek to obscure their actions and intentions with shadow magic.

variants.name: forest
variants.description: Infused with the spirits of ancient forests, this green hat enhances botanical spells and communication with nature spirits.

variants.name: gray
variants.description: This gray wizard hat is perfect for those who wish to walk unseen, cloaking the wearer in mist and shadows.

variants.name: green
variants.description: Bright and vibrant, this green wizard hat is soaked in life energy, amplifying healing and growth spells.

variants.name: lavender
variants.description: This delicately scented lavender hat is steeped in ancient wisdom, boosting the wearer's magical knowledge and spell accuracy.

variants.name: leather
variants.description: This rugged leather wizard hat offers physical protection as well as magical, warding off both blades and curses.

variants.name: maroon
variants.description: Dyed with the blood of dragons, this maroon hat is for wizards who seek to harness the raw power of fire and battle magic.

variants.name: navy
variants.description: This navy hat allows its wearer to delve into the mysteries of the deep sea, enhancing magic that involves water and ice.

variants.name: orange
variants.description: This blazing orange hat contains the fury of the sun, perfect for those who channel fire and light into their spells.

variants.name: pink
variants.description: Soft pink and enchanting, this wizard hat enhances charm and bewitchment spells, weaving a spell of attraction around the wearer.

variants.name: purple
variants.description: This deep purple hat is favored by sorcerers who draw their power from the twilight, enhancing both dark and light magics.

variants.name: red
variants.description: This red hat is soaked in ancient warspells, granting its bearer significant boosts in combat magic and protective wards.

variants.name: rose
variants.description: Infused with the essence of a thousand rose petals, this hat enhances spells related to love, peace, and healing.

variants.name: sky
variants.description: This light blue wizard hat is perfect for those who seek to master the air, offering control over the winds and the skies.

variants.name: slate
variants.description: This slate-colored hat is imbued with earth magic, perfect for wizards specializing in protection and barrier spells.

variants.name: tan
variants.description: This tan wizard hat is crafted from desert cloths, offering resistance against sandstorms and enhancing earth and wind spells.

variants.name: teal
variants.description: This teal hat is soaked with the power of freshwater lakes, enhancing water spells and providing clarity of mind.

variants.name: walnut
variants.description: Made from the bark of the ancient Walnut tree, this hat increases the wearer's affinity with the forest and its creatures.

variants.name: yellow
variants.description: This bright yellow wizard hat radiates a warm, soothing energy, amplifying light-based spells and providing illumination in the darkest places.
